title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon until crisp; set aside.
Whisk eggs with parmesan and pepper.
Toss hot pasta with bacon, then off heat mix in egg-cheese until creamy.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, and salt (30+ min).
Sear chicken until mostly cooked; set aside.
Sauté onion; add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and chicken; simmer until thick.

title: Mediterranean Salad
summary: Crisp veggies with olives, feta, and lemon dressing.
ingredients: Olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt
steps: Whisk olive oil, lemon, oregano, and salt.
Toss veggies with olives, feta, and dressing.

title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
summary: Silky soup made with mushrooms, garlic, and cream.
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and mushrooms in butter.
Stir in cream, season, and serve.
